overview: The songs on this DVD are: 1. Lifted, 2. Ocean Drive, 3. High, 4. Raincloud, 5. Lost in Space, 6. Loving Every Minute, 7. Free / One, 8. Question of Faith, 9 Ain't no Sunshine, 10. Goodbye Heartbreak, 11. Run, 12. Postcard from Heaven, 13. Happy, 14. I Could Have Loved you
title: The Lighthouse Family: Greatest Hits
